DESIGNER.TITLE: Designer
DESIGNER.DESC: Start your journey in web design with an internship at our company. As a web design intern, you will work on real projects and develop your skills under the guidance of experienced professionals. This position will provide you with valuable knowledge and practical experience for a successful career in the tech industry. You will learn in a working environment, creating useful and user-friendly solutions. If you want to gain new knowledge and skills and start a career in web design, this opportunity is for you.

UL: Experience with major graphic editors
Knowledge of UI/UX design principles
Ability to create visually appealing and functional interface designs
Ability to find unconventional solutions
Desire to experiment with new ideas
Effective interaction with other team members
Ability to listen to others' ideas and offer your own
Active participation in discussions
Proposing new solutions and options
Desire to learn and develop in the field of web design
High level of self-organization and responsibility

MOBILE_DEVELOPER.TITLE: IOS Engineer
MOBILE_DEVELOPER.DESC: Start your journey in iOS development with our internship program. As an iOS developer intern, you will work on modern mobile applications for Apple, developing your skills alongside experienced professionals. This position will provide you with valuable knowledge and practical skills for a successful career in technology. You will learn in a working environment, creating user-friendly solutions and improving the functionality of iOS applications. If you want to embark on a path that combines innovation and learning, this opportunity is for you.

UL: Understanding the basics of mobile platform development
Knowledge of Swift and SwiftUI
Experience with Apple Health Kit & iCloud SDK is a plus
Ability to work with Git
Active participation in discussions
Proposing new solutions and ideas
Effective interaction with colleagues
Willingness to learn from more experienced developers
Eagerness to master new technologies and tools
Commitment to continuous professional growth

FRONTEND.TITLE: Frontend Developer
FRONTEND.DESC: We are looking for a passionate frontend developer intern who is ready to develop their skills and learn new things. This internship will provide you with a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in the world of web development, work on real projects, and gain valuable experience. We offer you the chance to become part of a team of professionals, where you can apply your knowledge, master new technologies, and contribute to creating innovative solutions. If you are ready for challenges, join us and take your first steps in the exciting field of frontend development!

UL: Understanding the principles of web technologies
Experience with React, TypeScript, and build tools, particularly Webpack
Ability to work with Git version control system
Openness to new technologies and methods
Commitment to improving skills and developing in frontend development
Willingness to work in a team and interact with colleagues
Ability to give and receive constructive feedback
Accuracy in working on user interfaces
Ability to notice and correct errors and shortcomings
Readiness to complete assigned tasks on time
Ability to independently solve arising problems

QUALITY_ASSURANCE.TITLE: QA Engineer
QUALITY_ASSURANCE.DESC: Start your career as a QA intern, delving into the complex world of testing web and mobile applications for Apple. This internship is not just about finding bugs; it is a learning experience that will equip you with the knowledge and skills for a successful future in technology. Your practical experience here will lay the foundation for becoming an industry expert. Join our team and turn each case into a step towards a successful career.

UL: Ability to develop test cases and test plans to verify application functionality
Creating and maintaining test documentation, including test descriptions and scenarios
Skills in creating tickets for found defects
Describing expected results, actual results, and steps to reproduce the error
Proposing new ways and ideas to improve processes
Striving to achieve results and effectively tackle challenges
Ability to work effectively in a team and interact with colleagues
Communication skills, openness to suggestions, and readiness for constructive communication

EXPECTATIONS.H3: Attention to Detail and Analytical Thinking
UL: Accuracy in working with test documentation and test cases
Ability to identify and analyze minor details and defects
Analytical approach to problem-solving and defect detection

BUSINESS_ANALYST.TITLE: Business Analyst
BUSINESS_ANALYST.DESC: Start your career as an analyst, using data to improve our web and mobile applications. Analyze trends, find key information, and help in decision-making. Your insights will impact the functionality and engagement in social networks. This role offers an excellent opportunity to develop and grow in analytics. Take your skills to the next level and contribute to our success!

UL: Analyzing market trends and target audience needs
Assessing the competitive advantages of our product
Creating and implementing a promotion strategy across various communication channels, including social media, blogs, partner sites, and media
Working with diverse media and communication platforms
Analyzing promotion results and measuring campaign effectiveness
Adjusting strategies and plans based on feedback
Active participation in discussions and decision-making for product development
Result-oriented and attention to detail
Initiative and accountability for results
Good communication skills and the ability to find common ground with different people
Ability to work effectively in a team and interact with colleagues

COPYWRITER.TITLE: Copywriter
COPYWRITER.DESC: Start your career as a copywriter, where you will create engaging and effective texts for various platforms. Dive into content creation that will resonate with our audience and support the brand at the highest level. Your work will be key to shaping the company's image and improving communication with clients.

UL: For the website
For mobile applications
Creative approach to generating ideas
Desire to learn to create captivating headlines and texts
Active participation in discussions
Proposing new solutions and options
Desire to gain experience in a real project
High level of empathy, sufficient for working in an international team
Willingness to learn and work with AI tools for writing texts
Willingness to complete tasks you take on
Ability to work independently

CONDITIONS: — This is an unpaid internship for 2-3 months, — your work is not paid, you receive knowledge and work experience
— There are no strict hours, you can work at any convenient time
— Work from home on your own device
— If you need to be away from the project for a few days — that's okay, but please let us know in advance so that your internship does not end prematurely
FEATURES: — Unique opportunity to develop and become a key player in our team
— Opportunity to impact the healthy lifestyle and well-being of our users
